body_html: It's a little less surprising when you know that there's no efficient algorithm to compute Jacobian in this setting, therefore all neural net frameworks use reverse mode AD which requires target to be a scalar
body_text: It's a little less surprising when you know that there's no efficient algorithm to compute Jacobian in this setting, therefore all neural net frameworks use reverse mode AD which requires target to be a scalar
